bestsellers.author: Lucinda Berry
bestsellers.description: When a reality show about former child stars overcoming addiction culminates in murder, their therapist must take a closer look into their lives—and her own, from USA Today bestselling author Lucinda Berry.
bestsellers.narrated_by: Saskia Maarleveld, Tessa Albertson, Brittany Pressley
bestsellers.title: One in Four

bestsellers.author: Rina Kent
bestsellers.description: I’m a golden boy. A genius law student, the heir to the Carson empire, and the dutiful son. Or, at least, that's what it looks like from the outside. Deep inside, I have the urge to set the world on fire.
bestsellers.narrated_by: Stephen Dexter, Grayson Owens, Teddy Hamilton, and others
bestsellers.title: Kiss the Villain

bestsellers.author: Barry Diller
bestsellers.description: Barry Diller’s book is about much more than business. It is a remarkably honest and entertaining account of his personal journey and a fascinating tour through show business and digital media.
bestsellers.title: Who Knew

bestsellers.author: Alice Winters
bestsellers.description: Despite winning Gabriel’s heart, my trials are not yet over when I’m stuck competing with Gabriel’s cat for his affection (why is she only evil when he’s not looking?), dealing with coworkers trying to befriend me (I should have blackmailed more of them), and worst of all...
bestsellers.title: A Forgotten Mistake

bestsellers.author: Nyla K
bestsellers.description: Kyran Harbor is everything I'm not. Rich. Popular. A superstar football player who's awfully broody for someone who has it all. Basically, he's a preppy jock who hates me. Oh, and he's also my stepbrother....
bestsellers.title: For the Fans

bestsellers.author: J.J. Mulder
bestsellers.description: Carter Morgan III hates everything about South Carolina University except for one thing: hockey.
bestsellers.title: Shots on Net

bestsellers.author: CE Ricci
bestsellers.description: Catching feelings was never part of the plan. Taking in Kason Fuller as roommate is meant to be a favor; one I regret immediately. The bumbling, virgin football player drives me to the brink of sanity—stealing my food, my sleep, my peace, and solitude. My solution? Call a ceasefire.
bestsellers.title: Fair Catch

bestsellers.author: Bob the Drag Queen
bestsellers.description: From RuPaul’s Drag Race winner, Traitors contestant, and host of HBO’s We’re Here comes an inventive, wondrous novel about American hero Harriet Tubman that remixes history into a fresh, dynamic novel about love, freedom, salvation, and hip-hop.
bestsellers.title: Harriet Tubman: Live in Concert

bestsellers.author: Graham Norton
bestsellers.description: From internationally bestselling author and host of The Graham Norton Show, a dazzling and decades-sweeping story about love, bravery, and what it means to live a significant life.
bestsellers.title: Frankie

bestsellers.author: Nicole Maser
bestsellers.description: In a world overrun by an unprecedented outbreak, two young women find themselves on opposite sides of the struggle for survival.
bestsellers.title: Hearing Red

bestsellers.author: Tori Chase, Deborah Garland
bestsellers.description: Protecting him is my duty, but falling for him could be my undoing. I’ve spent five years burying my past, leaving behind the violence and bloodshed of my former life as a Bratva enforcer.
bestsellers.series: A Dark MM Hockey Bodyguard Romance
bestsellers.title: My Pucking Crush

bestsellers.author: Ames Mills
bestsellers.description: I thought I had everything figured out—until I met Jaxon. I'm dominant by nature, but Jaxon brings all that out in full force. What started as a one-night stand after his confession that he's never been with a man quickly turns into a whirlwind.
bestsellers.title: For the Love of Kane

bestsellers.author: Steven Rowley
bestsellers.description: From the bestselling author of Lily and the Octopus and The Editor comes a warm and deeply funny novel about a once-famous gay sitcom star whose unexpected family tragedy leaves him with his niece and nephew for the summer....
bestsellers.title: The Guncle

bestsellers.author: Jay Krauss
bestsellers.description: Steel Foundations asks the question: What if a 16th-century German knight was thrust into a world of magic, gods, and monsters, forced to navigate the unknown while mourning the loss of everything he once knew?
bestsellers.title: Steel Foundations

bestsellers.author: Ashley James
bestsellers.description: Penelope Boswell is my best friend. She’s my person. She’s who I call when I have good news and bad. She’s my comfort. My solace. But in the same breath, she’s my want, my longing, my ache. She isn’t mine. She never will be. It’s a special kind of cruel to be in love with someone you shouldn’t.
bestsellers.title: Wren

bestsellers.author: Erin Russell
bestsellers.description: I always thought of Silas Rush as my biggest rival on the track and a stuck-up loner off of it. He and his fancy pro career left our crappy hometown in the dust before high school even finished, and then I didn't think of him much at all. Now he's back.
bestsellers.title: Stupid Dirty

bestsellers.author: Abigail Glenn
bestsellers.description: I sacrifice my personal life and health to lead mercenary teams dedicated to wiping out high-profile criminals. I leave no room for normal things like relationships. Until a pretty little thief breaks into my high-rise and shatters what I'd come to believe was peace.
bestsellers.title: Ignite

bestsellers.author: K Webster
bestsellers.description: I’m in love with my best friend. Lie. I’m in love with my enemy. Truth. But they’re the same. They. Are. The. Same. Lines in my world are blurry between fantasy and reality. Truth and lies. Love and hate. Copeland Justice is my enemy. My once best friend....
bestsellers.title: Wicked Lies Boys Tell

bestsellers.author: Sarina Bowen
bestsellers.description: The furniture district is my personal hell. I don’t know my ass from an ottoman. But when a hot designer comes to my rescue, I realize my problems are bigger than the house I’m trying to furnish....
bestsellers.title: I'm Your Guy

bestsellers.author: Sarina Bowen
bestsellers.description: My name is Hudson Newgate, but my teammates call me "New Guy". That was my nickname in Chicago, too. And Vancouver. That’s what happens when you keep getting traded. Brooklyn is my last chance, especially after my poor performance last season....
bestsellers.title: The New Guy

bestsellers.author: Emmy Sanders
bestsellers.description: What’s a straight guy to do when he accidentally goes on a date with his brand new gym-bro? Offer to be the best wingman ever, of course! It’s foolproof. Joey needs a man? I’ll find him one. He wants someone who looks, well, kind of like me? No problem! Not into watersports? I’ve got him covered.
bestsellers.title: 10 Ways to Accidentally Fall in Love

bestsellers.author: Kristen Kish
bestsellers.description: Accidentally on Purpose dives into Kristen Kish’s childhood as a Korean adoptee in the Midwest, finding purpose in kitchens, and becoming the season 10 winner of—and now host—of Top Chef all the while navigating life in the spotlight.
bestsellers.title: Accidentally on Purpose

bestsellers.author: Emily Rath
bestsellers.description: My name is Tess Owens, and my life is officially on fire. I never thought dancing at my best friend's wedding would be the match to light the flames....
bestsellers.title: Pucking Wild

bestsellers.author: Jen Lyon
bestsellers.description: When Kameryn Kingsbury lands one of the most coveted roles in cinema history, she’s certain it’s the most monumental thing that’s ever happened to her—until a twist of fate introduces her to Dillon Sinclair.
bestsellers.title: The Unfinished Line

bestsellers.author: T.B. Markinson, Miranda MacLeod
bestsellers.description: A late bloomer lesbian doctor. A stepdaughter’s best friend. A taboo passion that could destroy them both.
bestsellers.title: The Anatomy of Forever

bestsellers.author: Haley Cass
bestsellers.description: For the first time, Regan Gallagher is facing the world without her best friend by her side—no, Sutton isn't dead but she is in Rome, following her dreams. And Regan really is thrilled for her. Left to her own devices, she's doing . . . fine.
bestsellers.title: The Snowball Effect

bestsellers.author: Ruby Roe
bestsellers.description: Octavia Beaumont, one of the original three vampires, is determined to run the city. Red, an expert hunter, is hell-bent on getting revenge on the vampire that turned her sister.
bestsellers.title: House of Crimson Hearts

bestsellers.author: Adrian J. Smith
bestsellers.description: Monti Schroeder is on a quest for peace. She has been since the moment she was born. But peace has remained elusive. Living as a nomad, she takes work where she can get it. When her sister calls with a favor for her neurotic boss, Monti agrees to it for a few extra bucks.
bestsellers.title: Shameless Expectations

bestsellers.author: RuPaul
bestsellers.description: In The House of Hidden Meanings, RuPaul strips away all artifice and recounts the story of his life with breathtaking clarity and tenderness, bringing his signature wisdom and wit to his own biography....
bestsellers.title: The House of Hidden Meanings
